subtitleNullable: Dataset for creating an Image Search Engine
descriptionNullable:
### Context

This dataset is being made for creating an image search engine where a user uploads an image and similar images are returned. 

### Content

The *ImageSearch* directory contains 4 directories namely,
* dataset -> Contains the label binarized pickle file, training, validation and testing splits of the dataset.
* The other directories contain the images corresponding to that class name. The folder names are the class names. 

The *train.csv* and *validation.csv* contain the extracted features of all images present in the training and validation datasets after passing them through a MobileNet CNN without the fully connected layers.

### Acknowledgements

All the data was downloaded from Flickr using their Flickr API. The script for downloading the images can be found at [Download Images Script](https://gitlab.com/GotamDahiya/helper-scripts/-/blob/master/download_images_flickr.py)

### Inspiration

This dataset is being made for an Image search engine, which can allow users to search highly specialised datasets. All the images are first passed through a CNN, then en encoder, clustered using a clustering algorithm and finally images present in the cluster are compared with the query image using Siamese networks. Here is the [README](https://gitlab.com/GotamDahiya/imagesearchengine)

Banner Picture Credits:
